title: Gab & Juls: Racism Overshadows Madrid Derby
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Real Madrid's 2-1 victory over Atletico Madrid and discuss the punishments that Atletico Madrid must face after a group of fans sang racist songs about Vinicius Jr before the match. The guys also discuss Arsenal's 3-0 win over Brentford and how one of their players made Premier League history in the process, Bayern's 4th game without a win, and whether time might be up for Max Allegri at Juventus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Real Madrid's Madrid Derby victory overshadowed by racism towards Vini Jr.; Arsenal's title challenging chops; Crisis in full swing at Bayern Munich
